div.pre: 881 Neseb√¢r (anc. Mesembria) environs, c. 40 km. NE of Burgas, Bulgaria, 1935 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. or later (T) Contents: 1 AR, 40 AE Apollonia Pontica: 1 tetrob. Mesembria: 40 AE Disposition: Burgas coll. Gerasimov, BIAB 11 (1937), p. 319
